<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Increased max_length of 'name' field in mid_cert_check_policy table as a FQDN can be as long as 255. </description>
        <name>Increase max_length in name (mid_cert..)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
dictionaryGR.addQuery('name','mid_cert_check_policy');
dictionaryGR.addQuery('element','name');
dictionaryGR.query();

if (dictionaryGR.next()) {
	dictionaryGR.setValue('max_length','255');
	dictionaryGR.update();
	gs.info("Max_length of 'name' field in mid_cert_check_policy table increased to 255");
}
]]></script>
